resources.string: Please check your email to verify your email address.

This device is not approved yet.

You must approve this device from one of your already approved devices.

Once approved, you will be able to access your accounts.

The original device is approved automatically.

If you have more than one additional device to add, please feel free to add them all before approving.

Please close the app for now.

This device is not approved.

If you would like to approve this device, please enter the confirmation code and click approve.

If you would like to deny this device, please press the deny button.
